about_section.revealText: For me, it was just 'I love what I do, so I want to do as much of it as possible.' - Kobe Bryant
about_section.description: I embarked on my journey into the programming world in 2023 as a self-taught enthusiast. Throughout this period, I dedicated myself to various study projects that allowed me to enhance my skills and understanding of fundamental concepts. Now, I feel prepared to embrace professional opportunities that enable me to apply and expand my knowledge. My primary focus is on web and mobile development, with a specialization in React and React Native. I am eager to contribute my passion for programming and my ability to learn quickly to the success of future projects.
